titles.title: SAFE Grilling Act
SAFE Grilling Act
Strengthening Awareness and Funding Education for Grilling Act
To direct the Consumer Product Safety Commission to develop and implement a public awareness campaign with respect to grill safety, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Strengthening Awareness and Funding Education for Grilling Act or SAFE Grilling Act
This bill requires the Consumer Product Safety Commission to develop and implement a public awareness campaign about the dangers associated with cooking using a grill and best practices for using a grill safely to prevent injuries and fires.
